## XRTracker - AR Image Tracking Project

This is an AR project using the MindAR library for image tracking and displaying PNG overlays.

### Project Structure

- Uses MindAR.js for AR functionality
- HTML5 for the main interface
- A-Frame for 3D scene management
- CSS for styling
- JavaScript for AR logic and image tracking

### Key Features

- Image target tracking
- PNG overlay display
- Real-time AR rendering
- Camera access and management

### Development Guidelines

- Keep AR performance optimized
- Ensure proper camera permissions
- Test on mobile devices
- Use responsive design patterns
